reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks and feels more expensive, with a perfect fit that hits just at the knee. They appreciate its high-quality construction, comfortable feel, and true-to-size measurements. The dress receives positive feedback for its material, with one customer noting it's made from a heavier material, and customers like its color, with one specifically mentioning the baby blue shade. Customers find the dress flattering, with one noting it works well for curvier figures. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, great price
items.body: This is a beautiful, high-quality dress. It fits perfectly, washes easily in cold water in delicate cycle then just hang to dry. And the price was reasonable for the degree of quality. I highly recommend it!!! Read more
items.author: Alyssa Mariano

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, Comfy and warm
items.body: Super cute and comfy. The perfect winter dress is soft and warm. Our 13-year-old would normally wear a large, but I sized it up so it would not be tight in the bust. She has worn it to church and to a piano recital. The neckline is great because she has some cute necklaces that look great on the blue backdrop. It has been laundered several times. I washed it in cold water on delicate; then dried it on low (delicate) until just damp and then hung the dress to finish drying. It has not shrunk or started to pill. The blue color is really pretty and she has received dozens of compliments. I am very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Carla

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pleats are too much for me.
items.body: Very pretty, comfy, and soft. Great price. I think it would be warm for winter. Nice weight, not too thick. Form fitting. At 5'8", it came just above my knees. Pleats will be way too much work for me to constantly maintain. Great dress otherwise. Read more
items.author: isy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: This dress was well made and very comfortable Read more
items.author: Sharon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!!
items.body: Great material, very thick and nice , definitely not cheap looking. Fits perfectly and it’s comfortable as well. It’s warm & very nice for the winter. I love it so much that I bought it in 2 colors. Read more
items.author: Anna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: Love the fit, color and style of this! I get compliments every where I go. It’s so comfortable and flattering. True to size! Read more
items.author: Stacie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great quality but …
items.body: Love the dress but it was worn with multiple purple stains throughout the dress. Will order again Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfy!
items.body: Super cute dress length is just right. Fabric is soft, stretchy and washes well. I’m 5ft 8in and 180lbs 38DDD and ordered a size large fit perfect! Read more
items.author: Shannon Schoedler

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hotpink, Navy, Khaki, White, Beige, Lightblue, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
